import java.util.*;
class stringcode{
	public static void main(String[] args){
		Scanner in = new Scanner(System.in);
		int t, i, l; t = in.nextInt();
		while(t-- > 0){
			String input = in.next();
			char a[] = input.toCharArray();
			l = a.length;
			for(i = l / 2 - 1; i >= 0; i--)	System.out.print(a[i]);
			for(i = l - 1; i >= l / 2; i--)	System.out.print(a[i]);
			System.out.println();
		}
	}
}
